text:
Pt. s/p ercp 6 wks ago with stent and perc drain placement.  while at
   rehab drain "fell out" and unable to replace.  Pt. signed out AMA.  He
   has been feeling poorly, c/o  fevers and abd pain.  Admit w/abd pain
   and temp 103.  Decompensated in EW; becoming hypoxic and combative.
   Intubated for airway protection.  Presep cath/multilumen placed and
   transfered to CCU (MICU border). [**9-14**] SPIKING FEVERS TO 104,REQUIRING
   PRESSERS,WORSENING RF,ACIDOSIS,K TO 7,ARRHYTHMIAS,CRRT STARTED,TX I
   UNIT PRBC
   PMHX: cabg, AAA, gout, obesity, IDDM.crf
   Renal failure, Chronic (Chronic renal failure, CRF, Chronic kidney
   disease)
   Assessment:
   ACIDOSIS IMPROVING,CVVHD RUNNING WELL,CA,K REPLETED PER PROTOCL ,GOAL
   EVEN BALANCE
   Action:
   Q6HR BLOOD WORK,
   Response:
   PT [**Name (NI) 1940**]
   [**Name (NI) 171**]:
   CONT, CRRT PER PROTOCOL,NOTIFY FELLOW C CONCERNS IF ANY
   Sepsis, Severe (with organ dysfunction)
   Assessment:
   AFEBRILE ,BP STABLE ,LACTATE DECREASING ,STEROID DOSE DECREASED
   ,PIPRICILLIN DC ,
   Action:
   WEANED OFF PRESSERS ,ANTI BX AS ORDERED ,BLOOD CX SENT ,1 UNIT PRBC
   Response:
   TOL PRESSER WEAN
   Plan:
   FOLLOW TEMP  CONTINUE ,ANTI BX  ,MONITOR VS
   Cholangitis
   Assessment:
   CHOLE TUBE IRRIGATED ,DSD CHANGE  PER ORDERS ,PATENT DRAINING PURULENT
   TAN ,SECURELY ANCHORED TO PT ,US  DONE
   Plan:
   MAINTAIN PATENCY ,INTACT DSD
   Diabetes Mellitus (DM), Type I
   Assessment:
   HYPERGLYCEMIA,ON STEROIDS
   Action:
   INSULIN GTT
   Response:
   BS COMING UNDER CONTROL
   Plan:
   HOURLY BS ,TITRATE INSULIN AS NEEDED
